name: Bridgedale Hike Lightweight T2 Coolmax Performance Boot - Unisex
categories: Hike Lightweight T2 Coolmax Performance Boot
description: Stay cool without sacrificing comfort. Lightweight fabric lets your piggies breath. Anti-shock cushioning stands up to the roughest trails all summer long.Made of Coolmax breathable, moisture wicking polyester, nylon, and elastane to keep your feet cool and dry.Performance fit is sleek and supportive from foot to calf.Flat toe seam gives added comfort.T2 anti-shock cushioning offers next level impact protection.
